noun.description: A person born as a result of miscegenation; the issue of a union between people of different races or ethnic groups.

verb.description: To give rise to miscegenation; (of a race) to intermarry with another race. Now frequently in extended and figurative use.

origin: Late 19th century. From miscegen- + -ate. Compare earlier miscegenate<br>mid 19th century. From miscegen- + -ate. Compare miscegenate.
